product_name: Power Grips PowerGrip - The Ultimate Universal Rack
long_description: The unique camming action of this universal storage rack allows convenient storage of skis, snowboards, shovels and many other awkwardly shaped items. When mounted vertically, the clampshoes can accommodate a width of 1.75 inches and hold up to 22 pounds. Textured rubber surface adds grip and won't damage skis or tools. Mounting hardware and instructions included.
short_description: The unique camming action of this universal storage rack allows convenient storage of skis, snowboards, shovels and many other awkwardly shaped items.
